title: Handle Fraudulent Ticket Claim
description: A guest presents a ticket that has already been scanned, claiming their ticket must be the valid one.

tasks.description: Look up the ticket's unique barcode in the access control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the ticket was already scanned 20 minutes prior at a different gate.

tasks.description: Explain the 'first scan is the only valid scan' policy to the guest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly and calmly explains the venue policy regarding duplicate tickets.

tasks.description: Advise the guest to contact their original point of purchase, as the venue cannot honor a duplicated ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct advice to the guest.

tasks.description: Log the incident, including the ticket details, as a potential fraud case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a record of the incident for security and ticketing review.
